channel.description: Recent content in Jason-Calacanis on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Has Netscape.com been hacked?
item.description: I’m one of these contrary people who thinks Jason Calacanis is right on the money (literally) regarding the payment of the top Diggers (or Scapers?). For amusement I headed over to Netscape.com and was shocked to discover my Netscape Netcenter login details from about 8 years ago did not work. Well maybe not that shocked. So I signed up with new details, waited for the conformation email and clicked on the link.
